pullRequest.title: Feature/exam multi correction/exam multi correction
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes

Motivation and Context
This PR will be a followup to https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis/pull/2594. It completes the changes to the assessment dashboard and all the underlying and necessary changes on the server.
It resolves occurring issues with displaying submissions. (Assessed / Unassessed ones)
Description
The following changes are done within this PR:

All behavior related to non-Exam Exercises and views should be exactly as it was
Progress bars are updated to work with a second correction
Assessment dashboard display bug-fixes
query bug-fixes
server and client tests

Steps for Testing

Create an exam with 1 or 2 correction rounds
create Text-, Modeling-, Quiz-, and Programming Exercises
assign students
participate in the exam
assess the exam with:
correctionRounds=1: everything should work as normal
correctionRounds=2:

the second progressbar should be shown, aswell the Correction Round 2
after an assesssment in the first round, the possibility for a new assessment under second correction should appear. This button does not have its functionality yet!
During assessment try: Locking, Overriding, Submitting



Test Coverage
tutor-participation-graph: 100%
exercise-assessment-dashboard: 84.15%

Screenshots

nodes.bodyText: This can be removed now right?
This also as you are already using the correctionRound?

commit.message: added exam table multi correction column and first changes to direct Exam components
added exam table multi correction column and first changes to direct Exam components
First version of changes to enable view of multiple results including renaming of properties
Added checks to exam creation to only allow one or two correction rounds
refactored stats calls and renamed method
refactored calls for dasboards duedatestat arrays

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Stephan Krusche <krusche@in.tum.de>
Fixed bug where the exam progressbar was broken due to faulty query
fixed test failing due to missing attribute
refactoring, renaming of method with bad naming, fixed test
only allow 1 or 2 as input for correctionRounds
removed displaying of correctionRounds in exam information component
added tests, added missing calls to setLatestSubmissionResults, fixed count query
Fix progressbar Bug, added logs for debugging
added first changes for second correction view changes
added correct correctionround handling to queries for submissions without assessemnt
getAllSubmissions client and server changes: use correctionRound
finished REST call and function changes
work on query, added request for all correctionrounds to client
fixed bad query, second correction is now shown.
changed correctionround 1 to 0 in exercsie assesssment dashboard
fixed bug in html, added debug information for bug fixing
adapted java tests to new REST calls
fixed three tests and removed log statements
fixed codestyle and disabled second correction: new assessment button
first version of server tests for new multi correction queries
second version of server tests for new multi correction queries
simplyfied qurey and put correctionRound filter out of SQL into java

nodes.bodyText: How to you ensure that only assessments which do not have a manual result are selected if you remove this?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -117,26 +117,41 @@
     Optional<StudentParticipation> findByExerciseIdAndTeamIdWithLatestResult(@Param("exerciseId") Long exerciseId, @Param("teamId") Long teamId);
 
     /**
+     * todo SE, NR: maybe re-add
+     * 'and not exists (select prs from participation.results prs where prs.assessmentType IN ('MANUAL', 'SEMI_AUTOMATIC'))'
+     *
      * Find all participations of submissions that are submitted and do not already have a manual result and do not belong to test runs.
      * No manual result means that no user has started an assessment for the corresponding submission yet.
      *
      * If a student can have multiple submissions per exercise type, the latest submission (by id) will be returned.
      *
+     * @param correctionRound the correction round the fetched results should belong to
      * @param exerciseId the exercise id the participations should belong to
      * @return a list of participations including their submitted submissions that do not have a manual result
      */
     @Query("""
             select distinct participation from StudentParticipation participation
             left join fetch participation.submissions submission
-            left join fetch submission.results result
-            left join fetch result.feedbacks feedbacks
+            left join fetch submission.results results
+            left join fetch results.feedbacks feedbacks
             where participation.exercise.id = :#{#exerciseId}
+            and 0L = (SELECT COUNT(r2)
+                             FROM Result r2 where r2.assessor IS NOT NULL
+                                 AND (r2.rated IS NULL OR r2.rated = FALSE)
+                                 AND r2.submission = submission)
+            and
+              :#{#correctionRound} = (SELECT COUNT(r)
+                             FROM Result r where r.assessor IS NOT NULL
+                                 AND r.rated = TRUE
+                                 AND r.submission = submission
+                                 AND r.completionDate IS NOT NULL AND
+                                 (participation.exercise.dueDate IS NULL OR r.submission.submissionDate <= participation.exercise.dueDate))
             and not exists (select prs from participation.results prs where prs.assessor.id = participation.student.id)
-            and not exists (select prs from participation.results prs where prs.assessmentType IN ('MANUAL', 'SEMI_AUTOMATIC'))

nodes.bodyText: This can be removed since it is not used

commit.message: fixed correctly displaying finished/unfinisehd, and exercises with 0 submissions

nodes.bodyText: Do we want to have a log here or was it for debugging purposes?

Here as well, correctionRound = correctionRound ?? 0;

nodes.bodyText: Here as well, correctionRound = correctionRound ?? 0;. However it's just a subjective preference since it just looks odd having 3 x correctionRound. If this is juts me just remove the comment
Do we want a log here?
